posts.post_content:
Hi, I upgraded my Downey card, so I have one to sell.  I paid $15 for Downey, so I would like to sell it for SOLD, thank you.

The interesting thing is that you can see Zimmerman at the top of the card.

Any type of payment is fine, or I would love to trade for a low grade beater T213-2 or Weil Baking even if I have to throw in a few bucks to even up the trade.

Thanks, Rick
I'll take it if it's still available...PM sent.  Thanks!
